ISO Resource Center

 

Welcome to the Pearl Capital ISO Resource Center created exclusively for our current and prospective ISO Partners! Here you will find all kinds of useful resources for professionals in the MCA and FinTech industry, including videos like “The Adventures of Pearlman” series, tools like our Syndicated Leverage Calculator, and infographics like “How To Use the Price Calculator.” On top of all that, you will also be able to revisit previously recorded ISO webinars, downloadable PDF versions of the slides, newsletters, and much more!

 

At Pearl Capital, we realize that our success lies within our ISO Partners’ ability to succeed.  With the ISO Resource Center, we hope to provide you with the tools and information you need to make funding your MCA deals with Pearl more efficient and profitable than ever before.

 

Guides for ISOs

We know that Pearl’s success starts with our ISO Partners’ ability to get more deals closed, faster. So, we have created guides about our company, FinTech, and the merchant cash advance industry. Start with our How to Use the Price Calculator Infographic.

ISO Video Center

Videos have been a great resource for our ISOs to learn How the Syndication Leverage Program Works and How to Use the Price Calculator.  These videos offer tutorials on some of our most valuable tools. The Video Center is also home to “The Adventures of Pearlman” series, a fan favorite.

ISO Comics

We pride ourselves on being probably one of the only places on the web you will find comics on FinTech industry topics like financial underwriting, machine learning, and factoring. Don’t let the medium fool you, there’s some great information for ISOs within these resources! Read our latest comics here.

Sales Tools for ISOs

If you’re looking for more hands on applications to get your best MCA deals funded, check out our ISO Tools. You’ll find unique proprietary tools like the Pearl Capital Price Calculator where you have the ability to control your own deal. There’s also the Syndication Leverage Calculator which is a great way to see just how much more you can make when you syndicate with leverage.

ISO Webinars

Stay on top of industry trends and strategies with ISO Webinars from experts like Mike Langford of finServ Marketing. Topics cover developing a well defined target market, social media sales for ISOs, and more. You will also be able to download PDF versions of the slide decks to share with your colleagues, or just keep for your own learning. Check out the latest installments here.
